lyrics:
10 contributorssweetheart lyricsintro
sweetheart
god couldve never made two
nobody quite like you

verse 1
woke up this morning to your sleepy smile
i realized i havent told you in a while
that youre my life youre my dream
youre the reason for every song i sing
youre my rock youre my world
youre my always and forever girl

chorus
sweetheart
god couldve never made two
nobody quite like you
woah sweetheart
one kiss and i come unglued
you are the reason i fall to pieces
cause youre all that i adore
youre the one my heart beats for
and i cant believe you gave your sweet heart to me

verse 2
yeah youre sweet like chocolate hot like sriracha
yeah girl you got me right in your back pocket
youre smooth like whiskey fine like wine
i love how youre making my blood sugar rise
see thomas rhett liveget tickets as low as 37you might also likechorus
my sweetheart
god couldve never made two
nobody quite like you
woah sweetheart
one kiss and i come unglued
you are the reason i fall to pieces
cause youre all that i adore
youre the one my heart beats for
and i cant believe you gave your sweet heart to me

bridge
when the world gets cold
on those sleepless nights
oh girl you should know
that you will always be mine

chorus
sweetheart my sweetheart
god couldve never made two
nobody quite like you
woah sweetheart
one kiss and i come unglued
you are the reason i fall to pieces
cause youre all that i adore
youre the one my heart beats for
and i cant believe you gave your sweet heart to me
outro
ooh yeah you gave your sweet heart to me
ooh yeah you gave your sweet heart to me oh
please give your sweet heart to me1embed
